content.question: Let <math alttext="c" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> be the curve defined by <math alttext="x squared times y, equals 4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following statements is true of curve <math alttext="c" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> at the point <math alttext="with coordinates 2 comma 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: It has a relative minimum because <math alttext="y prime, equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="y double prime, is greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>″</mo></mrow></msup><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.

It has a relative maximum because <math alttext="y prime, equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="y double prime, is less than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>″</mo></mrow></msup><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.

It is decreasing and concave up because <math alttext="y prime, is less than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="y double prime, is greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>″</mo></mrow></msup><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.

It is decreasing and concave down because <math alttext="y prime, is less than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="y double prime, is less than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>″</mo></mrow></msup><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.

content.answer: It is decreasing and concave up because <math alttext="y prime, is less than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="y double prime, is greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>″</mo></mrow></msup><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.
